title: Thai Herb Chicken & Coconut Rice
content:
Typically called “Under Water Chicken”, this dish is super healthy, full of herbs and very flavourful. Skinless chicken leg is marinated in lemongrass, kaffir leaf, shallots, garlic and Jinda chilli overnight. The chicken is then steamed until soft and all the flavour is absorbed into the meat. We serve with coconut rice and steamed vegetables.

Energy: 507kcal; Protein:37.2g; Carbohydrate: 57.6g, of which sugars 6.6g; Fibre: 3.5g; Fat: 13.9g, of which saturates 7.5g

Gluten-free · Wheat-free · Dairy-free

title: Honey Chicken Tom Yum Noodles
content:
Grilled honey chicken with two types of gluten-free rice noodles. This dish comes to life when you toss the noodles with all the scrumptious toppings. The combination of herbs, peanuts, pickled radish, chopped beans, sweetened shrimp and spicy lime dressing makes for an explosion of flavours. A half boiled egg is added for extra protein!

title: Chicken Arrabbiata & Roasted Vegetable
content:
Arrabbiata literately means “angry” in Italian. As the name suggest this flavourful sauce promises to deliver a spicy punch and wonderful umami flavour from ripe tomatoes. We start by cooking red chilli pepper, garlic and tomato slowly in olive oil. Then we grill a lean chicken breast and top with fried capers. Accompanied with roasted vegetables and a handful of penne pasta to keep your carbs in check!

Energy: 390kcal; Protein:31.7g; Carbohydrate: 35.3g, of which sugars 11.2g; Fibre: 6.7g; Fat: 13.2g, of which saturates 2.5g

Chicken Breast, Tomato, Red Chilli, Basil, Garlic, Cherry Tomato, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Capers, Parmesan Cheese, Yellow Pepper, Eggplant, Zucchini, Red Onion, Pasta, Salt, Black Pepper

title: Grilled Coconut Chicken & Superfood Rice
content:
A perfect high protein light meal. Grilled chicken thigh, marinated in coconut milk and mixed Thai herbs. Served on top of a superfood riceberry rice salad, combining chopped kale, job’s tear and vegetables and a pot of chilli soy sauce.
We're pleased to say we use traditionally made soy sauce free from MSG/additives and which is certified gluten-free.

title: Steak & Gorgonzola Broccoli Gratin
content:
A modern twist on a family comfort meal. Tender and lean sirloin steak is marinated with miso paste and Dijon mustard overnight, then roasted to medium-rare. On the side is a creamy gratin, made with broccoli, cauliflower, potato and gorgonzola cheese (mild Italian blue cheese). Caramelised onion vinaigrette and fresh salad leaves complete the dish.

Low Carb · Gluten-free · Wheat-free

title: Chrysanthemum Tea
content: Chrysanthemum Tea - One of the most popular drinks for Thais. This tea has a delicate - slightly floral aroma and a slightly sweet - refreshing taste. It is good for your kidney and eyes.

title: Lemongrass Tea
content: Lemongrass tea (Caffeine-Free) has a slightly lemony taste without the bitter or tangy notes of classic lemons. It is mildly sweet and features a crisp, brisk finish. It helps boost the immune system since it's packed with vitamins and minerals that help fend off the common cold and flu. It is a refreshing beverage.

title: Matoom Tea
content: This tea is made from high quality Bael fruits. It is one of the most famous herbal tea among Thai people. It helps quench thirst and boost energy. It’s really good for your tummy and digestion when you’ve eaten too much! The smell is very aromatic and naturally refreshing and a bit sweet.

title: Roselle Tea
content: Roselle Tea: One of the most poppular herbal drinks for Thais. It tastes sweet and sour. It helps reduicng cholesterol in the blood system and canker sore.

title: Lime and Butterfly Pea Tea
content:
Lime and Butterfly Pea: one of the most poppolar herbal drinks for Thais. The tea tastes sours.
Good for the digestive system. Also, helps reducing the cholesterol in the blood.

title: Logan Juice
content: Logan Juice: another popular herbal drink. It is sweet. Helps with antioxidant and good for your digestive system.

title: Passionate Pineapple
content:
Pineapple’s tangy sweetness is a natural match for our luscious, juicy passion fruit. This energizing blend is exceptionally smooth, with a bright, intense flavor and floral aroma.

100% FRESH, COLD-PRESSED JUICE
No heat pasteurization, as fresh as it can be. All natural, no concentration.

title: Carrot Crazy
content:
Our blend of passion fruit, pineapple and mango is enriched by the subtle, earthy sweetness of fresh carrots. Lemongrass adds a hint of spice and herbal complexity to a full-bodied juice brimming with nutrients and antioxidants.

100% FRESH, COLD-PRESSED JUICE. No heat pasteurization, as fresh as it can be. All natural, no concentration.

title: Beet Blast
content:
The delicate sweetness of raw beets and the tantalizing spice of young ginger round out the vibrant tropical blend of passion fruit, pineapple, and mango. This silky juice is packed with vitamins to boost energy, improve circulation, and aid digestion.

100% FRESH, COLD-PRESSED JUICE. No heat pasteurization, as fresh as it can be. All natural, no concentration.

title: Young Ginger Shot
content:
All the flavor in one small bottle – because we all need a little shot of passion sometimes…

Young ginger brings enticing warmth to the invigorating passion fruit and pineapple blend. This delectable shot is bursting with antioxidants and natural anti-inflammatory to promote digestive and circulatory health, soothe joint pain, and boost energy.

title: White Tumeric Shot
content:
All the flavor in one small bottle – because we all need a little shot of passion sometimes…


The sunny tropical passion fruit flavor perfectly complements the earthy goodness of white turmeric with a touch of raw beet. This potent blend detoxifies and revitalizes, reducing inflammation, improving circulation, and enhancing mental clarity.

content:
Healthy Greek yogurt from our artisan producer with house-made peach puree and sprinkle of toasted nuts & seeds on top.

title: Gluten Free Passion Fruit Cheesecake
content:
Our hand-crafted dessert made a little healthier! Fresh passion fruit are swirled on top of a silky creamy cheesecake with a hint of lemon peel. We use agar in place of gelatin and the base is made with ground almond and dates, so it’s vegetarian and totally gluten free!

title: Brownie by Custard Nakamura
content: Brownies from Custard Nakamura, a famous bakery shop in Sukhumvit. Very fudgy, chewy or gooey in all the right places, studded with chocolate. Good dessert. Nice to have it to end your perfect meal!

title: Choux by Custard Nakamura
content: Choux from Custard Nakamura, a famous bakery shop in Sukhumvit. Solf texture stuffed with the tasty cream inside. The sweetness is just about right! Good dessert or to have it to end your meal!

title: Coconut Pudding
content: NAM HOM pudding mixed with young coconut flesh, a balance of light sweet taste of 100% NAM HOM water and soft coconut flesh makes the texture and the aroma so irresistible. Low calories & cholesterol free. Can be enjoyed frozen or chill or in between!

content:
Grilled chicken breast. Power up your day with an extra protein boost - perfect for those ravenous gym addicts!

title: Hummus with Veggie Dippers
content:
An eons-old Middle Eastern classic; Hummus, is one of best healthy snacks you could have on hand. This lovely dip is made with chickpea, tahini (sesame paste) and lemon juice. We top with extra virgin olive oil, pistachio nuts and a bit of smoked paprika. Served with assorted vegetables for dipping.

title: Tonkutsu Sandwich by Custard Nakamura
content: Tonkatsu Sandwich from Custard Nakamura, a famous bakery shop in Sukhumvit. Soft bread outside and fully stuffed with tasty Tonkatsu pork inside. This can be eaten alone or along with your mian dish.

title: Chicken & Black Sticky Rice Parcel
content: Stick Rice & Chicken Parcel: comes with black sticky rice and galic chicken wrapped in a banana leave. The chicken is chewy and has a nice smell of the garlic. Good for snack or you can eat it along with a main dish.

title: Pork & Black Sticky Rice Parcel
content: Stick Rice & Pork Parcel: comes with black sticky rice and galic pork wrapped in a banana leave. The pork is chewy and has a nice smell of the garlic. Good for snack or you can eat it along with a main dish.

title: Salted Beef & Sticky Rice Parcel
content: Stick Rice & Salted Beef Parcel: comes with black sticky rice and salted beef wrapped in a banana leave. The beef is chewy and tasty. Good as snack or you can eat it along with a main dish.

title: Spicy Korean Ribs & Onsen Egg
content:
Hot! Our home-made spicy Korean chilli sauce are fiery and delicious. Soft end of the spare-ribs are cooked until meat fall off the bone. Serve with onsen egg and sweetened daikon.

title: Orrecchiette with Broccoli & Prosciutto
content:
Orecchiette means “little ears” in Italian due to the shape of the pasta. We take inspiration from a traditional southern dish called “orecchiette alle cime di rapa” using broccoli instead of rapa. First we sauté garlic and chilli before adding a small amount of anchovies for its saltiness. This is combined with blanched broccoli before finally adding the cooked pasta. For extra luxury we top the dish with smoked prosciutto and garlic crumbs.

title: Vegetable Moussaka
content:
One of the most popular dishes in Greek cuisine. Creamy, juicy and delicious. We make this recipe especially light and suitable for vegetarians. The Moussaka is a layer of aubergine, potato, vegetable ragu topped with skinny béchamel sauce made from yogurt, ricotta and egg yolk. It’s then grilled in the oven until the top is gooey and golden. Served with mixed salad.

title: Gluten Free Tuna Casserole

A retro meal made from scratch with fresh nutritious ingredients. Chunky tuna with butter bean and smoky pancetta make a perfect flavour combination. title: Salmon Kra Prao & Quinoa Rice
content:
The nations favourite dish, a simple pad kra-prao with a healthy twist. Cubes of salmon are gently roasted until moist and fork-flaky, before being tossed in a homemade holy basil sauce. Served with lots of grilled vegetables and a mixture of Riceberry rice and quinoa.

Energy: 609kcal; Protein:36.3g; Carbohydrate: 63.1g, of which sugars 4.6g; Fibre: 6.6g; Fat: 23.6g, of which saturates 5.4g

Gluten-free · Wheat-free · Dairy-free

from

Chef Jib

Thai kitchen

title: Seabass Quinoa Tortilla Salad
content:
Paprika adds a wonderful smokiness to any dish. We use it to give a rich smokey flavour to a Seabass fillet before lightly grilling until golden. Served on top of salad made with cherry tomato, red beans, quinoa, chilli, grated cheddar and corn chips for extra crunchiness. To finish, we top with tangy avocado salsa.

Energy: 295kcal; Protein:27g; Carbohydrate: 21.4g, of which sugars 3.8g; Fibre: 7.4g; Fat: 14.6g, of which saturates 2.1g

Seabass, Paprika, Cumin, Chilli Powder, Salt, Black Pepper, Cherry Tomato, Spring Onion, Kidney Bean, Quinoa, Green Cos, Coriander, Red Cabbage, Corn Chips, Lemon Juice, Avocado, Red Chilli,

title: Spicy Chicken Quesadilla
content:
Comforting Mexican dish. A wholewheat tortilla is filled with chicken pieces mixed with peppers, onion, sweet corn, whiskey BBQ sauce and spicy tomato sauce. A sprinkle of cheddar and Parmesan before the tortilla get toasted until lightly crisp on the outside and cheese melted inside.

Energy: 589kcal; Protein: 38.8g; Fat: 21.6g, of which saturates 6.7g; Carbohydrate: 59.8g, of which sugars 8.7g; Fibre: 8.2g

Chicken Breast, Garlic, Red Pepper, Green Pepper, Onion, Sweet Corn, Barlotti Bean, Tomato Puree, BBQ Sauce, Chilli Powder, Cheddar, Parmesan Cheese, Green Oak, Sour Cream, Tortilla, Salt, Black Pepper, Extra Virgin Olive Oil

title: Teriyaki Chicken with Vegetables & Rice
content:
Comforting yet healthy dish. Lean chicken breast is marinaded in house-made teriyaki sauce. Served with steamed vegetables and organic sticky brown rice.
